__comment__: Use `models` to specify the models that should be served by the ranking service:
Every model should contain the following properties:
`path` may be any path pointing to a valid model file, e.g.:
=> note: this is not required for avg-emb.
Use `corpus` to specify the NDS FTS corpus that should be served by the deepspell daemon:
This may be any path pointing to a valid corpus file, e.g.:
Use `discriminator` to specify the token category discrimination model:
This may be any path pointing to a valid deepspell.DSLstmDiscriminator model, e.g.:
Use `extrapolator` to specify the auto-completion model:
This may be any path pointing to a valid deepspell.DSLstmExtrapolator model, e.g.:
